name: Midnight Mysteries 4: Haunted Houdini
description: Famed illusionist Harry Houdini knew he wouldn’t escape death forever. When he promised his wife that he would try to reach her from the afterlife, it was seen as the ultimate stunt But after years of séances, Bess was never able to reach Harry in this life or the next, and her spirit has come to you in a final plea to reunite her with...
minimum_requirements: OS:XP/Vista/7Processor:1.6 GHzMemory:1024 MB RAMDirectX®:9.0Hard Drive:475 MB HD space

reviews.review_text: Another hidden object adventure game in the Midnight Mysteries series. This time we follow Houdini intertwined with a little bit of Sir Conan Arthur Doyle. You are trying to find out who has killed Houdini and why he died. Another decent hidden object game. Definitely worthwhile of playing. Good graphics and decent mix of puzzle and hidden object scenes.
awesome game. so much fun and such a cool story line
